<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.","type":"object","properties":{"params":{"description":"params holds all the parameters of this module.","type":"object","properties":{"allow_morse_account_import_overwrite":{"description":"allow_morse_account_import_overwrite is a feature flag which is used to enable/disable\nthe re-importing of Morse claimable accounts by the authority.\nSuch a re-import will:\n- Ignore (i.e. leave) ALL claimed destination Shannon accounts/actors\n- Delete ALL existing onchain MorseClaimableAccounts\n- Import the new set of MorseClaimableAccounts from the provided MsgImportMorseClaimableAccounts\nThis is useful for testing purposes, but should be disabled in production.","type":"boolean"},"waive_morse_claim_gas_fees":{"type":"boolean","title":"waive_morse_claim_gas_fees is a feature flag used to enable/disable the waiving of gas fees for txs that:\n- Contain exactly one secp256k1 signer\n- Contain at least one Morse account/actor claim messages\n- Do not contain any other messages other than Morse account/actor claim messages"}}}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
